content:
To fix the database connection issue:

  1. First, verify your .env file has correct credentials
  2. Run npm install pg to ensure PostgreSQL client is installed
  3. Restart your server after configuration changes

Example connection string:

postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/dbname

reviews.comment: Perfect step-by-step solution. The connection string example was particularly helpful.
Worked for me! Would suggest adding a note about SSL requirements for production.

reviews.comment: The exponential backoff implementation saved our production system!
Great solution. Suggest adding Redis caching for even better performance.
Worked but took me a while to understand the exponent calculation.
